CustomField.description: Configuration of the Campaign fields to copy for hierarchy propagation (#Sent, Budget, Cost), as a JSON mapping of target/source fields on the Campaign object, based on the CampaignMemberRecordTypeId set on the Campaign.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Configuration of the Campaign fields to copy for hierarchy propagation (#Sent, Budget, Cost), as a JSON mapping of target/source fields on the Campaign object, based on the CampaignMemberRecordTypeId set on the Campaign.
CustomField.label: Hierarchy Propagation
